content:
To email a link to an OmniScript, you create:

An integration procedure with a remote action that invokes the email-sending method, passing in required parameters.
A custom email template containing the desired text and merge fields for the OmniScript link.
In the OmniScript, an integration procedure action that calls the email integration procedure.

To implement this feature:

Create an Integration Procedure with a remote class of DefaultOmniScriptSendEmail and remote method of emailOmniScriptLink. Define key-value pairs including language, type, subtype, email target object ID, email template name, save as activity, and language code.
Add an integration procedure action to the OmniScript with settings including integration procedure key, extra payload key and value for contextId.

Create a custom email template containing the desired text and merge fields. The template must be Custom (without using Letterhead).

The recipient must have a Salesforce account to access the OmniScript but does not need a Salesforce account to view the email.
title: Emailing OmniScripts in Salesforce
